_comment: Set VLLM_ENABLED=true to use Qwen2.5-32B-Instruct-AWQ (pre-quantized) via vLLM; otherwise defaults to Mistral-7B+adapters

synthesizer.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_synth_v1 by default; legacy qwen2 adapters remain for historic use.

re_ranker.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_re_ranker_v1 by default; legacy qwen2 adapters remain for historic use.
